title: Did Sean Spicer Claim Trump Has the Authority to Change Spellings Like ‘Covfefe’?
subtitle: Although Spicer's actual reaction to the tweet drew widespread media attention, he did not claim that the President has the authority to change words.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer said President Trump had authority to add words like "covfefe" to the language.
